Activity: Log in to the system, check emails. Prepare for consultation with QA Testers.
Meet with @QATEST-1 and @QATEST-2 to review the report template for usability and accessibility issues. Discuss any potential challenges for users with disabilities or limited technical skills.

Incorporate accessibility best practices into the report template design. Ensure that the report is compatible with screen readers, uses appropriate color contrast, and provides alternative text for images.
Finalize the structure and content of the report template. Ensure that all sections are complete, accurate, and consistent in style and tone.
Lunch Break. Read some news about AI models.
Work on generating the data visualizations for each section of the report. Use appropriate software or tools to create clear, compelling charts and graphs based on the design specifications.
Populate the report template with the generated data visualizations. Ensure that the visualizations are properly sized, positioned, and labeled.
Review the complete report template with all data visualizations included. Ensure that the report is visually appealing, easy to read, and effectively communicates the key findings.
Submit the report template to @ITPM-1 for review and approval. Include a summary of the design process, the key features of the template, and any remaining open issues.
